verses.plain: Judge me, O LORD; for I have walked in mine integrity: I have trusted also in the LORD; therefore I shall not slide.

tokens.t: ; for I have walked in mine integrity: I have trusted also in the

verses.plain: Examine me, O LORD, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.

tokens.t: , and prove me; try my reins and my heart.

verses.plain: For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes: and I have walked in thy truth.

tokens.t: before mine eyes: and I have walked in thy truth.

verses.plain: I have not sat with vain persons, neither will I go in with dissemblers.

tokens.t: I have not sat with vain persons, neither will I go in with dissemblers.

verses.plain: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.

tokens.t: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.

verses.plain: I will wash mine hands in innocency: so will I compass thine altar, O LORD:

tokens.t: I will wash mine hands in innocency: so will I compass thine altar, O

verses.plain: That I may publish with the voice of thanksgiving, and tell of all thy wondrous works.

tokens.t: That I may publish with the voice of thanksgiving, and tell of all thy wondrous works.

verses.plain: LORD, I have loved the habitation of thy house, and the place where thine honour dwelleth.

tokens.t: , I have loved the habitation of thy house, and the place where thine honour dwelleth.

verses.plain: Gather not my soul with sinners, nor my life with bloody men:

tokens.t: Gather not my soul with sinners, nor my life with bloody men:

verses.plain: In whose hands is mischief, and their right hand is full of bribes.

tokens.t: mischief, and their right hand is full of bribes.

verses.plain: But as for me, I will walk in mine integrity: redeem me, and be merciful unto me.

tokens.t: But as for me, I will walk in mine integrity: redeem me, and be merciful unto me.

verses.plain: My foot standeth in an even place: in the congregations will I bless the LORD.

tokens.t: My foot standeth in an even place: in the congregations will I bless the

footnotes.text: where…: Heb. of the tabernacle of thy honour
